# Support

The Art of Tech: Not playing with a Full Tech contributors have limited availability to address general support
questions.

When looking for support, please first search for your question in these venues:

* TAOT:NPWAFT Website](https://taotnpwaft.org),
* [Open or closed issues

If you didn't find an answer in the resources above, try these official
resources:

*

GitHub issues are for tracking enhancements and bugs, not general support.

The open source license grants you the freedom to use our platform. It does not
guarantee commitments of other people's time. Please be respectful and manage
your expectations.

patreon:
